details.title: Humane Intelligence: A Human Factors Perspective for Developing Intelligent Cockpits
details.abstract: A human factors perspective for creating intelligent cockpits is described and explained. A conceptualized interface among the pilots, mental models, and human information technologies is proposed wherein knowledge concerning human cognition is meshed with the capabilities and limitations of artificial intelligence (AI). Necessarily, a different way of looking at the pilot's role in the intelligent cockpit is developed.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
